title: NASA emphasizes climate science role amid fiscal and partisan challenges
summary: In a summer of extreme weather events, NASA is emphasizing its role in studying the climate, efforts that face both fiscal headwinds and partisan divides.

title: Rocket Report: Space Force to pick three; Pythom strikes back
summary: "With this mission we’ve made big strides toward reusability."

title: NASA moving into next phase of exploration architecture review
summary: Three months after rolling out the first phase of its architecture for human exploration of the moon and Mars, NASA is heading into a second phase that will focus on Mars.

title: Pew Poll: Americans Want Space Program to Focus on Asteroids and Climate More Than Human Spaceflight
summary: The latest poll from the Pew Research Center once again found that by a wide margin Americans want the space program to focus more on the threat from asteroids and […]

title: Booster 9 rolls to the upgraded Starbase pad ahead of Static Fire test
summary: Booster 9 has arrived at the Orbital Launch Site ahead of a Static Fire test, which will also be used to validate repairs and upgrades of Starship’s launch pad. That rollout is a key milestone in the campaign ahead of the second flight of the world’s most powerful rocket.
